channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The man betting everything on AI and Bill Belichick
item.description: UNC Chancellor Lee Roberts is making big bets on AI and Bill Belichick, and he sounds like a Silicon Valley CEO while doing it.

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: A takeover that might not be hostile
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: 11 Best Housewarming Gifts We Can't Stop Using (2025): Coasters, Blenders, Sheets

item.description: No, GPT-5 did not solve a bunch of previously unsolved math problems.
